about_the_game: This demo contains the full first 4 levels of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Partial Nudity.

detailed_description: This demo contains the full first 4 levels of the game.
name: Island of the Ancients Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage is recommended

short_description: A single-player, action-adventure, third-person / first-person shooter set on a tropical island.
